comments: While this is a ridiculously easy course, get ready for some occasional annoyance. Her "in-class" assignments are actually at home essays. The tests are written and sometimes the wording can be confusing. However, extra credit is usually offered and it is a very easy A. The material for the first half of the semester is especially interesting.
Ms. Schlager is an awesome teacher, she is so easy and its very easy to get good grades. I would definitely take her again.

Very boring class and attendance is mandatory. The tsets are all short essay; however, she is very generous in her grading. Two one page assignments and an essay. A good deal of reading, but major points are encapsulated in her Powerpionts
